sections.title: About
body: In this project I create a virtual environment that allows users to explore game development with Entity-Component Systems (ECS), a game design pattern commonly used in large scale, data heavy, games. My motiation for this project is to create an environment for beginner game programmers to learn and play at the same time.

sections.title: Features
body: - Example programs and tools to run on USER OS
- A custom ECS based programming language

sections.title: Skills and Tools
body: -  Game Design, Java and Groovy Programming, Java Class Loaders
-  Badlogic's libGDX Library, Ashley ECS Framework, GitHub, Netbeans IDE
